actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate that the United States should support the right to self-determination of the people of the Republic of Moldavia and northern Bucovina.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the U.S. Government should support: (1) the right of self-determination of the people of Soviet-occupied Moldavia (a.k.a. Moldova) and Northern Bucovina and issue a statement to and Northern Bucovina and that effect; and (2) any future efforts by the Government of Moldavia to peacefully negotiate the reunification of Romania with Moldavia and Northern Bucovina.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate that the United States should support the right to self-determination of the people of the Republic of Moldavia and northern Bucovina.
